name: Duterte-war-drugs
tagline: project illustrating so called "War on Drugs" initiated June 30 by new president of the Philippines, Rodrigo Duterte
body:
### Duterte war on drugs 
Since June 30 until October 10 in Philippines, 1135 people were shot according to official records. 
Unofficial records claim about 3500 victims in so-called "War on Drugs" extrajudicial killings initiated by president Duterte 2016-2019. 

This projects aim to visualize the data associated with the operations.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
